name: designcise/bitframe
description: PHP PSR-15 / PSR-7 middleware dispatcher microframework

suggest.designcise/bitframe-whoops: Whoops error handler middleware for BitFrame microframework
suggest.designcise/bitframe-diactoros: Zend Diactoros HTTP message middleware for BitFrame microframework
suggest.designcise/bitframe-fastroute: Fastroute router middleware for BitFrame microframework
suggest.designcise/bitframe-leagueplates: League Plates template renderer for BitFrame microframework
